metadata.title: CVE-2015-5296

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP1

metadata.description: Samba 3.x and 4.x before 4.1.22, 4.2.x before 4.2.7, and 4.3.x before 4.3.3 supports connections that are encrypted but unsigned, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to conduct encrypted-to-unencrypted downgrade attacks by modifying the client-server data stream, related to clidfs.c, libsmb_server.c, and smbXcli_base.c.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP1 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP1 is installed
